thread.title: Excellent, intimate, well-located and quiet.
thread.title_full: Excellent, intimate, well-located and quiet. - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Henry D
title: Excellent, intimate, well-located and quiet.
text: Intimate, comfortable, quiet, elegant and wonderful helpful staff. I have stayed in at least ten other places in Paris over the past 35 years including the Crillon, Meurice, Bristol, Ritz and Montalambert and will go back to Le Dokhan's on my next trip to Paris in three months. It's my kind of place.
